org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Interface Blueprint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlueprintImpl

    public interface Blueprint
    Blueprint representation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<String> getComponents(String service)
      Get the components that are included in the blueprint for the specified service.
      Configuration getConfiguration()
      Get the Blueprint cluster scoped configuration.
      String getCredentialStoreEnabled(String serviceName)
      Get whether a service is enabled for credential store use.
      HostGroup getHostGroup(String name)
      Get a hostgroup specified by name.
      Map<String,HostGroup> getHostGroups()
      Get the hot groups contained in the blueprint.
      Collection<HostGroup> getHostGroupsForComponent(String component)
      Get the host groups which contain the give component.
      Collection<HostGroup> getHostGroupsForService(String service)
      Get the host groups which contain components for the specified service.
      String getName()
      Get the name of the blueprint.
      String getRecoveryEnabled(String serviceName, String componentName)
      Get whether a component is enabled for auto start.

      Get all of the services represented in the blueprint.
      Setting getSetting()
      Get the Blueprint cluster scoped setting.
      Stack getStack()
      Get the stack associated with the blueprint.

      A config type is valid if there are services related to except cluster-env and global.

      Check if auto skip failure is enabled.

      Obtain the blueprint as an entity.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the name of the blueprint.
        Returns:
        blueprint name

      • getHostGroups

        Map<String,HostGroup> getHostGroups()
        Get the hot groups contained in the blueprint.
        Returns:
        map of host group name to host group

      • getHostGroup

        HostGroup getHostGroup(String name)
        Get a hostgroup specified by name.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the host group to get
        Returns:
        the host group with the given name or null

      • getConfiguration

        Configuration getConfiguration()
        Get the Blueprint cluster scoped configuration. The blueprint cluster scoped configuration has the stack configuration with the config types associated with the blueprint set as it's parent.
        Returns:
        blueprint cluster scoped configuration

      • getSetting

        Setting getSetting()
        Get the Blueprint cluster scoped setting. The blueprint cluster scoped setting has the setting properties with the setting names associated with the blueprint.
        Returns:
        blueprint cluster scoped setting

      • getServices

        Collection<String> getServices()
        Get all of the services represented in the blueprint.
        Returns:
        collection of all represented service names

      • getServiceInfos

        Collection<ServiceInfo> getServiceInfos()
        Returns:
        collection of all service infos

      • getComponents

        Collection<String> getComponents(String service)
        Get the components that are included in the blueprint for the specified service.
        Parameters:
        service - service name
        Returns:
        collection of component names for the service. Will not return null.

      • getRecoveryEnabled

        String getRecoveryEnabled(String serviceName,
                          String componentName)
        Get whether a component is enabled for auto start.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - - Service name.
        componentName - - Component name.
        Returns:
        null if value is not specified; true or false if specified.

      • getCredentialStoreEnabled

        String getCredentialStoreEnabled(String serviceName)
        Get whether a service is enabled for credential store use.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - - Service name.
        Returns:
        null if value is not specified; true or false if specified.

      • shouldSkipFailure

        boolean shouldSkipFailure()
        Check if auto skip failure is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, otherwise false.

      • getStack

        Stack getStack()
        Get the stack associated with the blueprint.
        Returns:
        associated stack

      • getHostGroupsForService

        Collection<HostGroup> getHostGroupsForService(String service)
        Get the host groups which contain components for the specified service.
        Parameters:
        service - service name
        Returns:
        collection of host groups containing components for the specified service; will not return null

      • getHostGroupsForComponent

        Collection<HostGroup> getHostGroupsForComponent(String component)
        Get the host groups which contain the give component.
        Parameters:
        component - component name
        Returns:
        collection of host groups containing the specified component; will not return null

      • getSecurity

        SecurityConfiguration getSecurity()

      • validateTopology

        void validateTopology()
               throws InvalidTopologyException
        Validate the blueprint topology.
        Throws:
        InvalidTopologyException - if the topology is invalid

      • validateRequiredProperties

        void validateRequiredProperties()
                         throws InvalidTopologyException,
                                GPLLicenseNotAcceptedException
        Validate that the blueprint contains all of the required properties.
        Throws:
        InvalidTopologyException - if the blueprint doesn't contain all required properties
        GPLLicenseNotAcceptedException

      • isValidConfigType

        boolean isValidConfigType(String configType)
        A config type is valid if there are services related to except cluster-env and global.
        Parameters:
        configType -
        Returns:

      • toEntity

        BlueprintEntity toEntity()
        Obtain the blueprint as an entity.
        Returns:
        entity representation of the blueprint

      • getRepositorySettings

        List<RepositorySetting> getRepositorySettings()
